description: Here’s what some schools are doing to fix food shortage impacting their cafeterias
title: How School Cafeterias Deal With Shortages
title_page: How School Cafeterias Deal With Shortages - The New York Times
maintext:
How School Cafeterias Deal With Shortages Madeleine Ngo Reporting on school cafeteria shortages ��
Katie Currid for The New York Times
U.S. school cafeterias are facing shortages of everything from chicken to apple juice and plastic cutlery as labor shortages cripple food distributors and manufacturers.
Here’s what some schools are doing to fix the food shortage →
